work.name: APEX project bureau
work.summary: Remote first line support in HelpDesk system. Diagnosing and solving various software and hardware problems, including corporate VPN access and VDI solution.
highlights: Migrated HelpDesk from GLPI to Zammad.
Deployed WikiJS platform, developed over 300 user and internal IT instructions.
Reworked the utility for automated creation of accounts for new users in AD.
Reworked a large part of puppet code base, created 80 new manifests.
Deployed additional software licensing services using guardant, wibukey.

work.name: School №1561
highlights: Organization of educational activities of the engineering division of the school with IT polygon, 1000 students per week.
Teaching robotics for grades 7 - 11 using Arduino, TinkerCad, Lego, ESP32, RaspberryPI.

Implemented "Smart School" project - distributed system of data collection and web visualization of temperature and humidity in school by Rapid SCADA on Raspberry Pi and sensor polling scripts on Python.

work.name: School №1561
highlights: Commissioned a new engineering building with IT polygon - 200 units of various computer equipment, server equipment, PCs, 3D printers/scanners, CNC machines
Implemented a PyQT utility for testing language exam with real-time processing and visualization of the sound signal.

work.name: School №1191
highlights: Development and teaching of a technology and computer science course.
Preparing students for robotics Olympiads and WorldSkills competitions in the competencies of "Electronics", "Mobile Robotics", "Space Systems Engineering".

work.name: Laboratory of Automated Systems (AS), LLC
work.description: Electronics, Tool Engineering, Computers and Office Equipment
highlights: Preparation of technical and commercial proposals, discussion of technical solutions with the customer.
Purchase of equipment for developed systems.
Issuing of installation tasks and participation in the installation of the system.
Testing of systems and products including software products.
